page.title: 15THE HALLS HUSBANDS BOSWORTH.
page.content: { The Church Hall}has a lot of things going on in there for example,the Brownies meet there,Thursday club meets there,the Table Tennis club go there for lessons,Tiny Tots go there,yoga is there,Bell ringing go there for lessons (and they sometimes play in the church)The Womens Institute,Good Companions,Sewing classes and Popmobility.They also have jumble sales and coffee mornings, Easter Friday shows and knitting classes.They also do competitions in the church hall.Sometimes they do needle work and waving.{The Village {Hall}has just about the right number of things going on,there is Badminton, Pantomimes,Singing,Gangshows,Concerts, Painting Classes,Discos,Short Tennis, Coffee Mornings,Jumble Sales,Bingo Nights and Bazaars.The real name for the hall is the Turville Memorial Hall
